WorkItem.Description: It would be useful to be able to maintain a per-character set of filters rather than a global set of filters.  For instance,  with one character I might be interested in the Tier 10 raid gear and with another only heroic dungeon gear.  One might be interested in considering pvp areana gear while another doesn't  One might be able to make use of Eng. bop crafted items while a different one might be able to use lw bop crafted items.
